intro: Bubroma, commonly known as the African violet, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Gesneriaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, Madagascar, and the Arabian Peninsula. They are popular for their ornamental value and ease of care when provided with proper light and moisture.
